services.remarks: For Unifi Service Check, please visit the given URL for latest offers.

terms & conditions: Yes, the access is within TM coverage.
Standard lead time (with infra: 4-6weeks, without infra: >4weeks)
The provided result can only be used for 1st level desktop checking.
Confirmation of access serviceable is subject to joint site survey.
The infra & capacity availability will be determined after joint site survey.
Space, internal wiring and main power supply subject to site visit.
For further confirmation, please contact our sales representative.
